result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew S. Fleurant

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Amy. 
Called:  2:28 p.m. 
INCLUDES 21CF700, 21CF907, 22CF308 and 21CF1171.
State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen. 
Defendant appears in person with Atty Michael Zell. 

Date and time set for plea/sentencing hearing. 
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  
COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding.
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty.

21CF700>>State moves to DRI Count 2 (Resisting or Obstructing an Officer/Repeater); COURT GRANTS.

21CF907>>State moves to DRI Count 2 (Bail Jumping-FelonyRepeater) and Count 3 (Possession of THC/Repeater); COURT GRANTS.  

21CF1171>>State moves to DRI Count 1 (Bail Jumping-Felony/Repeater), Count 2 (Bail Jumping-Felony/Repeater) and Count 3 (Possession of Controlled Substance/Repeater); COURT GRANTS. 

22CF308>>State moves to DRI Count 1 (Bail Jumping-Felony/Repeater), Count 2 (Bail Jumping-Felony/Repeater) and Count 3 (Bail Jumping-Felony/Repeater); COURT GRANTS.  


PLEA: 
21CF700 Count 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater): GUILTY.  

21CF907 Count 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater):  GUILTY.  

COURT ORDERS on each count:  SWH for 3 years probation; concurrent with each other and any sentence currently serving.  CONDITIONS:  60 days MCJ I/S for rules violations.  Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent.  AODA and follow up.  Maintain FTW/School or combination of the two of 30 hours per week, and if not so fully engaged, complete 10 hours community service per week.  Maintain absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol and controlled substances unless prescribed and taken only as prescribed.  Court costs including DNA sample/surcharge.  

Adj:  2:43 p.m.
